successes.title: A leather belt to last a lifetime—two if you count the cow's
successes.description: Probably the longest lasting leather belt you will ever find, and quite possibly the last you will ever need—guaranteed.

Pledges.description: One (1) Kendal & Hyde belt guaranteed to last a lifetime (any color/any size). $10 savings.
Two (2) Kendal & Hyde belts guaranteed to last a lifetime (any color combination/any combination of sizes). $25 savings.
Three (3) Kendal & Hyde belts guaranteed to last a lifetime (any color combination/any combination of sizes) $40 savings.
Four (4) Kendal & Hyde belts guaranteed to last a lifetime (any color combination/any combination of sizes). $55 savings.
Five (5) Kendal & Hyde belts guaranteed to last a lifetime (any color combination/any combination of sizes). $70 savings.
Six (6) Kendal & Hyde belts guaranteed to last a lifetime (any color combination/any combination of sizes). $85 savings.
Seven (7) Kendal & Hyde belts guaranteed to last a lifetime (any color combination/any combination of sizes). $100 savings.
